entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the students in the class and looks startled at Professor Trelawney's words.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as the teacher who will be teaching Divination.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the students in the class and has a conversation with Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: nervous face
entities.description: The phrase 'nervous face' is used to describe the faces of the students in the class.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron glanced at Hermione, who looked startled.
Professor Trelawney addressed the nervous faces of the students in the class.
Neville listened to Professor Trelawney's words.
